DOC.brief_summary: Combining fish oil vitamin C supplementation provide great anti-inflammatory effect develop exercise-induced bronchoconstriction ( EIB ) either nutritional supplement alone .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Fish Oil Vitamin C Exercise-Induced Bronchoconstriction Airway Inflammation Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study extend previous finding nutritional supplementation dietary modification ameliorate exercise-induced bronchoconstriction . It show separate study fish oil ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) individually protect EIB improve pulmonary function reduce airway inflammation . The main aim study determine comparative additive effect fish oil ascorbic acid supplementation EIB airway inflammation asthmatic individual .
